segments.text: Observing this, the kitchen feels lived-in and familiar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman in her dress and apron is the picture of domesticity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: However, the sink overflow is a shocking detail.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water pouring out like that is just wasteful and gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle at her feet is growing alarmingly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are climbing for cookies behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's reach is precarious on that shaky stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're breaking the rules, sneaking treats like little thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so expectant, palm open wide.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden path is tidy and inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This contrast between calm outside and chaos inside is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry the stool will give way any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole situation makes me feel a bit down for them.
segments.speaker: PAR
